page.title: 10R.A.F. BRAMPTON
page.content: Every serving person has to safeguard the camp and all classified material and information contained in it.The security has been increased lately,due to the growth of{terrorist}movements. The outskirts of the camp are surrounded by a ditch with fences of barbed wire around the top.There are three entrances to{R.A.F. Brampton, the main gate and two side gates.A pass is needed to bring a car inside. Visitors can obtain a temporary pass from the guard office,just inside the main gate. It's commanded by a{Wing Commander and four{squadrons.}There are many married quarters on camp,a sergeants mess,two officers messes and single blocks for single air men and women. There are two{NAAFIs}on camp. NAAFI is the services shop.
